title: Los inscripciones para recordatorios de la corte del condado de Bumcombe
description: Un proyecto de Code For Asheville

description.paragraph1: Este sitio le permite inscribirse para recordatorios de mensajes de texto acerca de las próximas fechas de la corte criminal en el Condado de Buncombe. Es gratis para uso de cualquier persona. Simplemente busque un nombre, seleccione uno de los acusados y proporcione un número de teléfono que pueda recibir mensajes de texto.
description.paragraph2: El sitio es mantenido por voluntarios para el beneficio de la comunidad. Su intención es ayudar a la gente a presentarse ante la corte en el Condado de Buncombe, pero no se garantiza. El comparecer ante la corte sigue siendo su responsabilidad.

courtguide.intro: [ES]Failing to appear in court can result in an order for arrest and financial penalty. Here are some things to remember as your court date approaches:
courtguide.item1: [ES]Arrive at the Buncombe County Courthouse, 60 Court Plaza in Asheville, 30 minutes before your scheduled court session.
courtguide.item2: [ES]Paid parking is available at Buncombe County parking deck across the street from the courthouse, at 164 College Street.
courtguide.item3: [ES]A security checkpoint is located at the courthouse entrance. All persons must have their bags scanned and pass through a metal detector.
courtguide.item4: [ES]Make the necessary arrangements ahead of time so you can be present for court.
courtguide.item6: [ES]You are responsible for appearing to all court dates. Be sure to know all of your court dates for any pending charges you have.
courtguide.if-miss: [ES]If you miss your court date, contact your lawyer immediately.
